content: *berroco yarns for this pattern have been discontinued directions are still available * *a crocheted half circle shawl with ample fringe in zen colors berroco * from berroco booklet #225 skill level intermediate materials berroco zen colors 50 grs 14 hanks #8141 mt fuji mix crochet hook size 6 00 mm j or size to obtain gauge shawl begins at center back neck edge cut 16-inch long strands for fringe be sure to reserve enough yarn for desired fringe additional information 1 1 http //archive berroco com/225/225_patricia_pv html
